article.title: Observational signatures of past mass-exchange episodes in massive binaries: The case of LSS 3074

multiple_choice_question.text: Which of the following emission lines is the MOST prominent in the optical spectrum of LSS 3074?
What type of orbit is assumed for the components of LSS 3074 in this figure?
Which component of LSS 3074 do the N III and N IV emission lines and the N V absorption lines primarily follow?
Which of the following emission lines exhibits a double-peaked profile throughout most of the orbital phases?
What information do the colour scales in these Doppler maps indicate?
choices: Level of the line emissivity relative to its maximum value

multiple_choice_question.text: What configuration of the binary system LSS 3074 does the best-fit theoretical light curve suggest?
What stellar parameter is varied in the synthetic CMFGEN spectra shown in this figure?
What spectral lines are particularly difficult to reproduce with the CMFGEN models for the secondary component of LSS 3074?
What is the approximate mass ratio (q) of the components of LSS 3074 derived from the orbital solution?
Which component of LSS 3074 shows a strong enrichment in helium in its atmosphere according to the CMFGEN model fits?
